scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BE,FE -c blue,magenta "npm run start:dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm i --prefix backend && npm i --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.clean:deps: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force backend/node_modules, frontend/node_modules; Remove-Item -Force backend/package-lock.json, frontend/package-lock.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
